title: GDG DevFest 2015 Announced
brief: The Google Developer Groups of Hamburg are proud to announce the second annual GDG DevFest Hamburg - the largest Google related event in northern Germany.

title: Call for Speakers
brief: GDG DevFest Hamburg 2015 conference day will be held on the 6th of November at the Betahaus in Hamburg. If you want to be part of this great event as a speaker this is your chance: Call for Papers
